overview:
## Discussion

Do not use this initializer. [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLRecommender] generates metrics for you when you call its [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLRecommender/evaluation(on:userColumn:itemColumn:ratingColumn:cutoffs:excludingObserved:)] method.

# init(precisionRecall:excludingObserved:)

**Initializer**

Creates metrics for a recommender, given a data table with precision and recall metric columns, and whether the recommender omitted training data.

## Declaration

```swift
init(precisionRecall: MLDataTable, excludingObserved: Bool)
```

## Discussion

Do not use this initializer. [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLRecommender] generates metrics for you when you call its [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLRecommender/evaluation(on:userColumn:itemColumn:ratingColumn:cutoffs:excludingObserved:)] method.
title: init(precisionRecall:excludingObserved:)
